alert.note: Alert for La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 4:32AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central La Salle, McMullen and northwestern Live Oak Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 432 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Leming to near Pleasanton to near Christine to 6 miles west of Cross to near Fowlerton. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Choke Canyon, Tilden, Calliham, Nell, Cross, Crowther, Simmons, Esseville and Whitsett. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 71 and 83. US Highway 281 near mile marker 618. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
